text: Anyway we could get the element ID links in the sidebar menu here to smooth scroll rather than require a full page refresh? Minor I know, but would be nice: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-tags>
Huh, they used to scroll I think
they didn't update the sidebar links when they changed the page url from modules to tags

Minor request: it would be nice to have a log out button on this page: <https://app.HubSpot.com/myaccounts-beta>
I have a couple of HS accounts that I need to switch between, and it's a bit annoying to have to click into a portal to log out.
